verbose_text: Although hyponatremia is common in clinical practice, our case report highlights that : (1) Profound hyponatremia with sodium level 101 mmol/L could have no CNS symptoms due to the remarkable adaption of brain; (2) severe hyponatremia is often multifactorial : (a) Even standard dose TMP-SMX is associated with hyponatremia which emphasized the need for greater awareness of this serious and potentially fatal complication.
